p: Starting from compound 2e (0.173 g, 6.22 × 10 −4 mol) and m-chloroperbenzoic acid (0.278 g, 1.61 × 10 −3 mol), compound 3e was obtained as a yellow oil (0.022 g, 13% yield). R f = 0.31 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum 1:3). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 1.26 (3H, t, J = 7.2 Hz, CO 2CH 2C H 3 ), 2.14 (2H, quint, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2C H 2 CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 2.51–2.56 (3H, m, C H 2 oxirane and OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 2.76–2.86 (3H, m, CH 2Ph and CH 2 oxirane), 3.12–3.16 (1H, m, CH oxirane), 3.86 (3H, s, OCH 3), 4.05 (2H, t, J = 6.0 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 4.14 (2H, q, J = 7.2 Hz CO 2CH 2CH 3), 6.75–6.79 (2H, m, H-3 and H-5), 6.84 (1H, d, J = 8.0 Hz, H-6) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 14.19 (CO 2CH 2 CH 3), 24.57 (OCH 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 30.74 (OCH 2CH 2 CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 38.29 (CH 2Ph), 46.78 (CH 2 oxirane), 52.55 (CH oxirane), 55.95 (O CH 3), 60.36 (CO 2 CH 2CH 3), 68.07 (O CH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 112.87 (C-3), 113.58 (C-6), 120.98 (C-5), 130.18 (C-4), 147.09 (C-1), 149.50 (C-2), 173.20 ( CO 2CH 2CH 3) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) alculated for C 15H 22NaO 5 [M+Na] + = 317.1359; found = 317.1359.
